entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Yellowknife
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:27 PM MST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -23.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Yellowknife Airport 4:00 PM MST Thursday 16 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -23.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -34
Dewpoint: -26.0°C
Wind: NE 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this evening then clearing. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 49 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 32.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 32. Wind chill minus 51 in the morning and minus 38 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 16 February 2023
